text: We're building a new website for an existing HubSpot customer with CMS Pro and want to stage the content. How can we get around this:

The help doc states you can stage content on a new domain.

Am I missing something?

Not sure which doc you’re looking at but the doc is probably talking about the content staging feature itself:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-staging>

We provide a staging domain so you don’t need to purchase a temporary domain.

Reminder: Content migration is one thing, but how do you migrate your skills? If you’ve got experience with WordPress we have a video series that helps you translate what you already know. <https://youtu.be/58y54YC3EtU>
